doDeleteGame: Are you sure you want to delete this game?

labels.drawTopCardOfEncounterDeck: Draw the top card of the encounter deck

shuffleRemainder: Shuffle the remainder of the encounter cards to build the encounter deck.
readyToBegin: You are now ready to begin.
addToken: Add 1 {'{'}{token}{'}'} chaos token to the chaos bag for the remainder of the campaign.
languageSettingDescription: This will change the language of the cards and app, but will default to English if a card or text is not available in the selected language.
enrollInBetaDescription: Beta features are likely very broken and games may be unrecoverable, please only enable this if you are willing to provide feedback.
